descriptionHtml:
Are you tired of those boring Mudcrabs sounds? Fear not, Ranting Mudcrabs are here!

This mod is a compilation of various sounds I secretly recorded from a friend on steam. The sounds include him yelling and ranting about. It started as a joke but then I figured maybe the community would enjoy this mod. 





To install:

Simply copy the folder into your main Skyrim install:

Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

or:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim


To uninstall:

Remove the folder labeled \"mudcrab\" from Data\\Sound\\fx\\npc 



Enjoy!
author: Foxpoop
